catalog_info.title: Classical Arabic Texts: Seminar
catalog_info.notes: Because the first day of fall 2015 FAS classes is following a Monday schedule, the first meeting of this class will be on Wednesday, September 2 .
catalog_info.prereq: Recommended: Three years of Arabic. Students are expected to be able to read 15-20 pages of classical Arabic per week.
catalog_info.description: Readings on selected topics in Islamic intellectual history.
